attributes.action: Make the carrying of knives in public an arrestable offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that unless it is needed for work related purposes,and carried securely in work bags then all knife carrying should be made illegal.There is no need in my opinion for anyone to be in possession of a knife in public, so must be outlawed.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
